JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Corneliu Bîrsan;Egbert Myjer;Elisabet Fura;Josep Casadevall;Luis López Guerra
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant was arrested mainly on charges of robbery and trespassing . The criminal proceedings against him and CARDINAL other persons were opened DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , he was released from custody .
CARDINAL . NORP In an indictment dated DATE , ORG attached to ORG committed the applicant and the CARDINAL other persons for trial .
CARDINAL . On DATE the case was registered with ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE , on an appeal by CARDINAL of the co - accused against an interlocutory judgment rendered in the case , the file was sent to the ORG , from where it was returned on CARDINAL DATE and was entered into the court 's list on CARDINAL DATE . However , none of the contents of the file could be found after DATE .
CARDINAL . Consequently , on DATE , ORG sent the case back to ORG to reconstitute the file .
CARDINAL . On DATE , under LAW , ORG referred the case back to ORG , this being the appropriate judicial authority to reconstitute the file at that stage of the proceedings .
CARDINAL . Therefore , on DATE , the case was re - entered into the ORG list .
Several items , such as the indictment and the arrest warrants , were requested from ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG considered the file reconstituted . It gave judgment on DATE , sentencing the applicant to DATE imprisonment .
CARDINAL . Most of the adjournments of the hearings were caused by the failings of the judicial authorities in summoning the defendants or civil parties
CARDINAL . Following an appeal by the applicant , the sentence was upheld in a decision of CARDINAL DATE of ORG and lastly in a final decision of DATE of ORG .
